sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de shēngyì zuò de hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Son commerce marche très bien.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His business is doing very well.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise fait la promotion de nouveaux produits.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company is promoting new products.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis d'accord avec ton point de vue.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I agree with your opinion.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 现代通信技术发展很快。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiàndài tōngxìn jìshù fāzhǎn hěn kuài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La technologie de communication moderne se développe rapidement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Modern communication technology is developing rapidly.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他正在经历痛苦的时期。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zhèngzài jīnglì tòngkǔ de shíqī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il traverse une période difficile.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is going through a painful period.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est apparu soudainement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He suddenly appeared.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 请提交完整的申请材料。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng tíjiāo wánzhěng de shēnqǐng cáiliào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez soumettre les documents de candidature complets.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please submit the complete application materials.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette méthode est très efficace.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This method is very effective.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une bonne idée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a good idea.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng wǎng hòu tuì yī bù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez reculer d'un pas.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please step back.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je pratique le chinois tous les jours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I practice speaking Chinese every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle a poussé la porte.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She pushed the door open.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a décidé de se retirer de la compétition.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He decided to withdraw from the competition.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ bàba míngnián jiù tuìxiū le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon père prendra sa retraite l'année prochaine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My father will retire next year.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Liǎng guó jiànlì le wàijiāo guānxi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les deux pays ont établi des relations diplomatiques.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The two countries established diplomatic relations.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā huì shuō duō zhǒng wàiwén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il parle plusieurs langues étrangères.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He can speak multiple foreign languages.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a exprimé son accord avec ce plan.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He expressed agreement with this plan.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们需要完善这个系统。
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons perfectionner ce système.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We need to improve this system.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les enfants aiment jouer avec des jouets.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Children like to play with toys.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 成功往往需要付出努力。
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le succès nécessite souvent des efforts.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Success often requires effort.
